updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <solid android:color="@color/white"/> <corners android:radius="12dp"/> <stroke android:width="2dp" android:color="@color/blue_primary"/> </shape>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/swipeRefreshOrdersTab" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<!-- Create Order Section --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Create Order" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<!-- Product Selection --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerOrderProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:padding="12dp" />
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Order Quantity --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Order Quantity" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<EditText android:id="@+id/editTextOrderQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:inputType="number" android:padding="12dp" android:background="@null" android:hint="Enter quantity" />
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Submit Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitOrder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:text="Create Order" android:textColor="@color/white" android:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" app:cornerRadius="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<!-- Pending Orders Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Pending Orders" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutPendingOrders" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>
</androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/swipeRefreshOrdersTab" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerOrderProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Order Quantity" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter order quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextOrderQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitOrder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="50dp" android:text="Create Order" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Pending Orders" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:paddingBottom="6dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutPendingOrders" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="8dp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/swipeRefreshSalesTab" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbarSales" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/blue_primary" android:title="Aquatrack - Sales" android:titleTextColor="@color/white" app:titleCentered="true" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.Material3.Light" />
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Add Sale" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:paddingBottom="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" />
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerSaleProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sale Quantity" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextSaleQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sale Amount" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="14sp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Sale amount" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextSaleAmount" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sale Date" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectSaleDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedSaleDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitSale" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="50dp" android:text="Submit Sale" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sales History" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:paddingBottom="8dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutSalesHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView> </LinearLayout> </androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/swipeRefreshSalesTab" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerSaleProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sale Quantity" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter sale quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextSaleQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sales Amount" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter sales amount" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextSaleAmount" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="numberDecimal" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sale Date" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectSaleDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="15sp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedSaleDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:paddingBottom="12dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitSale" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="50dp" android:text="Submit Sale" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sales History" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:paddingBottom="6dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutSalesHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingBottom="8dp" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout>
